title: Irrigation
brief_description: Green acres instead of parched earth - that is the satisfying aftermath of the construction of the St. Mary Dam Reservoir in southwestern Alberta. The film describes the irrigation system that now distributes life-giving water to farmland that was often stricken by drought.
